text: The 2019 SAFF U-18 Championship will be the 3rd edition of the SAFF U-18 Championship, an international football competition for men's under-18 national teams organized by SAFF. The tournament will be hosted by Nepal from September 20 to 29 September 2019. Nepal were the defending champions, having won both the previous editions in 2015 and 2017, however they lost in Group Stage. ==Squads== Players born on or after 1 January 2001 are eligible to compete in the tournament. Each team have to register a squad of minimum 18 players and maximum 23 players, minimum three of whom had to be goalkeepers. ==Participating teams== Pakistan had sent their entry for the meet and they were placed in Group A.
